forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 20C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 68F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 18C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 64F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 46F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain developing later in the day. High near 60F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 58F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 47F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 60F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
